X

XmlBoardLoader - Class in com.jeopardy.io
XML loader adjusted for files structured like: <JeopardyQuestions> <QuestionItem> <Category>Variables &amp; Data Types</Category> <Value>100</Value> <QuestionText>Which ...</QuestionText> <Options> <OptionA>...</OptionA> <OptionB>...</OptionB> <OptionC>...</OptionC> <OptionD>...</OptionD> </Options> <CorrectAnswer>A</CorrectAnswer> </QuestionItem> ... </JeopardyQuestions>
